title: World War III - Novel Updates
tags: Army Building   Businessmen   Economics   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Leadership   Male Protagonist   Military   Modern Day   Modern Knowledge   Organized Crime   Police   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secret Organizations   Time Skip   War Records   Wars   Wealthy Characters

description:
The shale gas revolution in the United States...

The trade war between China and United States...

Japan's export-control provocation attacking South Korea...

It was the event that triggered World War III.

Kim Garam, who resolved the threat of war Korea was facing joined the chaebol ranks.

What would the new world look like before him?>
